successes.title: Descent: Underground
successes.description: Descent is back! Pilot your ship & battle foes through twisting, turning tunnels with unrestricted 3D movement & FPS action in Zero-G!

Pledges.description: VIRTUAL HIGH-FIVE

Thanks for your support! Follow along with the project and participate in the community with your comments and feedback
+ Special thanks in the credits
+ Kickstarter Green Campaign ribbon in forums
EARLIEST BIRD: MATERIAL DEFENDER

+ Digital copy of Descent: Underground ($50 Retail) 
+ WASP - A good multi-purpose ship 
+ Beta access 
+ Special thanks in the credits 
+ Gold Campaign ribbon in forums
PREPARE FOR DESCENT

+ Digital copy of Descent: Underground ($50 Retail) 
+ WASP - A good multi-purpose ship
EARLY BIRD: MATERIAL DEFENDER

+ Digital copy of Descent: Underground ($50 Retail) 
+ WASP - A good multi-purpose ship 
+ Beta access 
+ Special thanks in the credits 
+ Gold Campaign ribbon in forums
MATERIAL DEFENDER

+ Digital copy of Descent: Underground ($50 Retail)
+ WASP - A good multi-purpose ship
+ Beta access
+ Special thanks in the credits

ADD A WINGMAN

+ 2 Digital copies of Descent: Underground ($50 Retail)
Each copy includes:
+ WASP - A good multi-purpose ship
+ Beta access
+ Special thanks in the credits
+ Gold Campaign ribbon in forums
+ Copies can be gifted after the campaign
THE ADVENTURER - Find the hidden secrets of each map

+ Digital Copy of Descent: Underground 
+ WASP
+ PREDATOR - A fast ship, excellent for scouting
+ Exclusive Kickstarter  BRONZE ship art
+ Beta access
+ Special thanks in the credits
+ Gold Campaign ribbon in forums
COMBAT READY - A group of 3 ships ready to kick butt and take names

+ Digital copy of Descent: Underground
+ WASP
+ PANZER - A tank that can give and take a beating
+ TYPHOON - Assault ship, ready for action
+ Exclusive Kickstarter BRONZE ship art 
+ Alpha access
+ Beta access 
+ Special thanks in the credits
+ Gold Campaign ribbon in forums
+ 1,000 Company scrip
PROSPECTOR'S SPECIAL -  If stockpiling resources and collecting loot is your thing, this package is for you

+ Digital copy of Descent: Underground
+ WASP 
+ AUGER -  Tunnel your way to victory
+ GOLIATH - Sturdy high-capacity ship
+ Exclusive Kickstarter BRONZE ship art
+ Alpha access 
+ Beta access 
+ Special thanks in the credits
+ Gold Campaign ribbon in forums
+ 1,000 Company scrip
I DID IT MY WAY - Pick any 3 ships

+ Digital copy of Descent: Underground 
+ CHOOSE 3 ships from the list below (After the campaign on the DS website)

WASP 
     PREDATOR 
     PANZER
     TYPHOON
     AUGER
     GOLIATH

+ Exclusive Kickstarter BRONZE ship art 
+ Alpha access 
+ Beta access 
+ Special thanks in the credits 
+ Gold Campaign ribbon in forums 
+ 1,000 Company scrip
SAFETY IN NUMBERS

+ 4 Digital copies of Descent: Underground 
Each copy includes:
+ WASP
+ Alpha access
+ Beta access
+ Special thanks in the credits
+ Gold Campaign ribbon in forums
+ Copies can be gifted after the campaign
